page.title: 06EVERYDAY LIFE (2)
page.content:
a football team. Quite a few watch football.
{HEALTH CARE Most people come to {Tiverton}to see their {doctor, }and the same with their{dentist}.Everybody's{doctor}is able to come to them.Their nearest {hospital and clinic}is in{Tiverton.
We think that life in{Halberton }must be difficult because they need to travel about{3_4}miles,to their{ {DENTIST, DOCTOR, HOSPITALS}and {CLINICS.}Also to go to the{ {SWIMMING_BATHS, YOUTH_CENTRE}and {TENNIS_COURTS.}However, having their shopping delivered must make life easier for old people, and also for mothers with younger children.
